name: Tony Stark
opinion: As a Doctor, Dr. Mahfuzur Rahman is a very sharp minded and well trained doctor. I was his emergency patient few months ago.

name: Thor
opinion: My grandma has some mental issues. After some months of taking therapy form Dr. Mahfuzur Rahman, She is quite well.

name: Thanos
opinion: I used this computer to attack on New York in 2012. Tony's Jervis couldn't stop me!!!

name: Peter Parker
opinion: This computer helped me to breack the training period of my suits. Tony made that for me.

name: Loki
opinion: Actually this computer dont consume that much power. Thor didn't know that I was stealing the electricity

name: Steve Rogers
opinion: I make a portal that allow me to talk with Peggy by chatting in messenger in that era. It's a useful domestic product.
